card.name: Unstable Footing
card.text: Reduce all damage dealt by 1. At the end of their turn a player may discard 2 cards to destroy this card

card.name: Rusted Hulk
card.text: Whenever damage would be dealt to all targets or all targets of a particular type, this target takes one instance of the damage and prevents the rest of it

card.name: Aquatic Environment
card.text: All effects that would occur at the end of a turn occur at the start of the turn instead. If a hero plays a card they cannot use a power that turn, and vice-versa. At the start of the environment turn, a player may discard their hand to destroy this card

card.name: Cold and Unpleasant
card.text: At the start of the environment turn, all targets take 1 cold damage. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card

card.name: Useful Cache
card.text: When this card is destroyed, a hero may draw 3 cards

card.name: Smugglers
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, this card destroys 1 hero card in play

card.name: Sound Carries
card.text: Whenever a target is put into play, play the top card of the environment deck. At the end of the environment turn, a hero may discard 2 cards to destroy this card
